name: St. Louis Group Antimony Metal
description: St. Louis Group Antimony Metal is a versatile ingot form of antimony, serving a range of vital roles. This metal finds its significance in applications such as batteries manufacturing and soldering flux, contributing to the creation of cables and supporting electrical and electronics markets. As an essential component in technical salts and inorganics, it embodies the prowess of antimony compounds.Â Antimony Metal is available in 4 grades: G1,G2,G3,G4.
